Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of mochas to make
- \( y \): number of regular coffees to make

Extracted Constraints:
- Coffee Powder: \( 3x + 6y \leq 400 \)
- Milk: \( 6x + 2y \leq 500 \)
- Minimum Mochas: \( x \geq 3y \)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize total production time: \( 5x + 3y \)
